original_text:
I led them with cords of kindness,
    with the bands of love,
and I became to them as one who eases the yoke on their jaws,
    and I bent down to them and fed them.
korean_text: 내가 사람의 줄 곧 사랑의 줄로 그들을 이끌었고 그들에게 대하여 그 목에서 멍에를 벗기는 자 같이 되었으며 그들 앞에 먹을 것을 두었노라

sentences.original_text: I led them with cords of kindness
and I became to them as one who eases the yoke on their jaws
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 턱의 멍에를 덜어주는 자와 같이 되었고

sentences.original_text: and I bent down to them
